name: Spinning Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Spinning Slash</font>
info:
Spin in place to carve every foe around you, then repeat the input to hurl yourself forward into another whirling slash that continues the assault.

Deals <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> when used on throwing blades at 13, 20 on daggers, 26 on halberds, reapers, and spears, 29 on greatswords, curved greatswords, greataxes, and great spears, 33 on straight swords, curved swords, backhand blades, katanas, and axes, and 36 on light greatswords.

When equipped on the Dragon Halberd, the follow-up strike releases ice lightning that adds <font color="#FFE033">Lightning damage</font>, <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font> buildup, and 10 extra <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> to every hit.

Cannot be parried when consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

name: Loretta's Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Loretta's Slash</font>
info:
Leap forward while cloaking the blade in glintstone, then dive into a sweeping slash as you land to catch distant foes.

The leaping strike deals 12 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and the finishing slash adds 10 more for 22 total, and each follow-up inherits any weapon buffs already on the armament.

Cannot be parried.

name: Storm Assault
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Storm Assault</font>
info: Wrap yourself in a cyclone, leap forward, and drive the armament into the ground to detonate another spiral of storm winds at the point of impact. The takeoff gust damages foes around you before the diving thrust lands, and the swirling winds linger briefly to pin targets in place.

name: Stormcaller
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Stormcaller</font>
info:
Spin the armament to surround yourself with storm winds, then repeat the input up to two times to step forward and unfold wider cyclones.

The initial sweep deals 24 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and each of the two follow-up whirlwinds adds 12 more each.

Cannot be parried when consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

name: Glintblade Phalanx
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Glintblade Phalanx</font>
info:
Conjure four magical dagger projectiles overhead; they hover defensively before automatically launching at the nearest enemy once they enter range. Following up with a strong attack chains the skill into a lunging thrust, and the glintblades can even track invisible foes so long as they have a clear path. Each blade shatters the instant it touches any geometry, so casting in tight quarters can waste the shots.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectiles):</font> 47

name: Flaming Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Flaming Strike</font>
info:
Sweep your off-hand to send out a short arc of flame, then follow up with a lunging slash that cuts through the blaze and coats the armament in fire. The follow-up buff adds 90 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> to the weapon for 40 seconds regardless of its affinity.

Deals 15 total <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> across both hits, and attempting it with no <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> produces no flame, fails to apply the buff, and greatly weakens the follow-up.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 138

The lunging slash can be parried even though the ignition wave cannot.

name: Parry
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Parry</font>
info:
Swing your armament with precise timing to deflect an incoming melee attack, breaking the enemy stance and usually opening them to a critical hit. Only certain melee attacks can be parried, and the timing window changes with the armament performing the skill.

On small shields Parry has 4 start-up frames and 5 parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS). On daggers it has 4 start-up frames and 4 parry frames, while medium shields, thrusting swords, curved swords, fists, and claws have 4 start-up frames and 2 parry frames at 30 FPS, demanding stricter timing.

name: Buckler Parry
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Buckler Parry</font>
info: Take a braced stance with the buckler and flick it out just before impact to deflect the attack, breaking the enemy stance and typically allowing a critical hit. Buckler Parry keeps the same 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS) as a small-shield parry but its deflection point occurs slightly earlier, letting you answer fast swings more reliably. Only parryable melee attacks can be turned aside, so spacing and timing still matter.

name: Parry
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Parry</font>
info: Use precise timing to swat aside a melee attack and stagger the foe, setting up a critical riposte if you are close enough. The parry window varies with the armament you are using: small shields share 4 frames of start-up and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS, daggers share 4 frames of start-up and 4 active frames, and medium shields, thrusting swords, curved swords, fists, and claws only give 2 active parry frames after the same 4-frame start-up. Only parryable melee strings can be deflected, so recognizing an opponent's moveset is key.

name: Storm Wall
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Storm Wall</font>
info:
Swing the shield to raise a short wall of storm winds that flicks away small physical projectiles and can also parry melee attacks to break an enemy stance. When used as a melee parry it has 4 start-up frames and 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS), while the projectile deflection activates instantly and grants 10 active frames.
Always consumes <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> even if nothing is deflected, and it only reflects lighter physical shots - great arrows and other heavy projectiles will still break through.

name: Thops's Barrier
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Thops's Barrier</font>
info:
Swing the shield through a conjured sigil to nullify an incoming sorcery or incantation, or parry a melee attack to break an enemy stance. The barrier appears after 3 start-up frames and grants 5 active parry frames at 30 FPS (double at 60 FPS), giving it a slightly later but tighter window than a small-shield parry while remaining identical regardless of the armament using it.
Only parryable melee strings and hostile spells can be reflected, but the barrier's timing stays consistent on every shield.

name: Enchanted Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Enchanted Shot</font>
info:
Hold the bow in a steady stance to infuse the next arrow with guiding essence, causing it to fly faster than normal, curve toward its target, and reach farther. While this stance is active each shot deals 50% more damage, builds 50% more status with every hit, and costs 50% more <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> than a regular arrow, but it still cannot pierce shields the way Mighty Shot does.

Used without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, the arrow loses its tracking, speed boost, and damage bonus, only 5% increase over a normal shot.

name: Sky Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Sky Shot</font>
info:
Crouch in a low stance to fire an arrow almost straight upward so it rains down on the spot where the target stood when released, often registering as a headshot and clearing low cover along the way. Shots fired this way deal 33% more damage than a normal arrow.

Holding the stance slows <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by roughly 80% and ends immediately if you move, and because the arrow locks on to the original location it is far easier to use against unaware or stationary foes - shots against a target back tend to hit the neck for reduced damage.

name: Rain of Arrows
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Rain of Arrows</font>
info: Hold to crouch in a low archery stance, firing each shot nearly straight up so it splits into a rain that lands where the target stood. Each barrage deals 50% of the arrow's normal damage and status buildup per projectile but can strike targets multiple times before the effect ends, and the skill can be activated as long as you have at least 1 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> remaining.

name: Storm Stomp
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Storm Stomp</font>
info:
Stomp to summon a tight cyclone that hits around you, keeping foes locked in hitstun and setting up follow-up attacks with the bound armament.

Deals 50 <font color="#F395C4">base physical damage</font> and 6 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

Cannot be parried.

name: Kick
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Kick</font>
info:
Deliver a fast, high kick that instantly staggers guarding enemies, opening them to a guard break. Available when you are bare-handed in either hand.

Deals 6 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

Cannot be parried.

name: Bubble Shower
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Bubble Shower</font>
info:
Blow the horn to launch a slow-moving spray of bubbles that drift forward before raining down in front of you.

Deals pure <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> and 72 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, 92 if all bubbles hit.

name: Moonlight Greatsword
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Moonlight Greatsword</font>
info:
Raise the sword aloft to wreathe it in the dark moon's light for 60 seconds, adding 65 <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> and 15 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> to every attack.

Heavy attacks launch moonlight projectiles that deal 120% of the weapon's frost buildup and 15 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, or 150% buildup and 24 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> when charged, while the weapon swings during the buff deal their full status and stance but 50% of their normal damage (65% when the projectile is charged).

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

name: Bear Witness!
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Bear Witness!</font>
info:
Drag the small dragon head along the ground into a fire-laced uppercut before launching a wide barrage of fireballs overhead.

The volley deals pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, inflicts 20 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> across the sequence, scales exclusively with <font color="#E0B985">faith</font>, and can be used from either hand like a shield skill.

name: Taker's Flames
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Taker's Flames</font>
info:
Raise the blade to wreath it in blasphemous flame before slamming forward and sending a chain of eruptions along the ground.

Each enemy hit returns 10% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 150, while the eruptions deal pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, inflict 22 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, and scale only with <font color="#E0B985">faith</font>.

name: Spearcall Ritual
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Spearcall Ritual</font>
info:
Hoist the spear skyward to summon a cluster of spectral spears above the target that rain down after a short delay.

The volley deals pure <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>, inflicting 26 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> spread across the spears.

name: Thundercloud Form
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Thundercloud Form</font>
info:
Transform into a rushing red thundercloud before plunging down with a lightning-charged strike. Holding the skill extends the cloud's travel distance without increasing the bolts' damage.

The passing lightning inflicts 6 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> per tick before the plunge lands for 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> or 33 when charged; all hits deal pure <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>.

Cannot be parried.

name: Cursed-Blood Slice
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Cursed-Blood Slice</font>
info:
Brace, then leap into a diagonal slash that paints a cursed trail which detonates moments later; repeat the skill for a horizontal follow-up that leaves a second delayed explosion.

Both strikes deal pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and inflict a combined 14 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

Cannot be parried while consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: I Command Thee, Kneel!</font>
info:
Slam the axe into the ground twice in succession to unleash two wide shockwaves, then repeat the skill for a third, larger shockwave.

The full sequence deals heavy <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font>, totals 19 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

Cannot be parried while conuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>

name: Bloodboon Ritual
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Bloodboon Ritual</font>
info:
Raise the sacred spear and pierce the Formless Mother up to three times, each thrust spawning an explosion of bloodflame that rains droplets around you before coating the weapon.

Each detonation deals pure <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>, totals 21 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> if all three inputs connect, and leaves the armament imbued for 20 seconds with 30 additional <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and steady blood-loss buildup on every hit.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

name: Ancient Lightning Spear
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Ancient Lightning Spear</font>
info:
Imbue the armament with ancient red lightning, take a short step forward, and hurl it as a spear of pure <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>.

Holding the skill charges the throw for higher attack power, causes the projectile to deal 9 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> that can knock back foes, and scales with weapon upgrades and <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font> while benefiting from charge-enhancing effects.

name: Last Rites
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Last Rites</font>
info: Raise the epitaph to bathe yourself and nearby allies in sacred order for 60 seconds, adding 25 <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> to their armaments and increasing <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10%. Attacks against Those Who Live in Death deal 100% more damage during the aura and prevent them from reviving, and the effect counts as an aura buff that will not stack with other Sacred Order boons.

name: Radahn's Rain
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Radahn's Rain</font>
info:
<font color="#C0B194">Unique Skill</font>

Settle into Radahn's hunting stance, firing each shot overhead so it splits into a dense rain that pours down where the target stood. The barrage deals reduced damage and status buildup per projectile but overwhelms foes with multiple hits, and switching to Radahn's Spears greatly boosts the rain's attack power.

name: Magma Shower
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Magma Shower</font>
info:
Slash in a tight circle to scatter pools of magma around you, then use an additional input to spin again and carpet the area in fire.

Each spin deals 18 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and the magma puddles linger briefly to keep scorching foes.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma):</font> 30

Cannot be parried while consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.

name: Transient Moonlight
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Transient Moonlight</font>
info:
Sheathe the blade while moving freely, then release into a stepping horizontal slash or a short-hop vertical slash depending on the follow-up input.

Both slashes launch waves of light; landing the projectile and katana from the light version deals 28 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, while the heavy version totals 30. Damage from the waves is purely magic, scales only with <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font>.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (normal projectile):</font> 140

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (strong projectile):</font> 155

Can be parried or reflected by retaliation skills.

name: Thunderstorm
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Thunderstorm</font>
info:
Imbue the wing-blade with lightning and spin it to surround yourself with a storm, chaining up to two additional spins with further inputs.

Each spin deals 16 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> on the first swing and 10 on each follow-up, and the weapon stays infused for 40 seconds, adding 120 <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> to every attack.

<font color="#F395C4">Base lightning damage (swirl):</font> 95

Cannot be parried. Does not trigger multi-hit effects.

name: Contagious Fury
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Contagious Fury</font>
info:
Raise the jellyfish shield to channel its rage for 30 seconds, draping yourself in red energy.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 13% for the duration, counts as a unique buff, and ends immediately if you swap the shield.

name: Dryleaf Whirlwind
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Dryleaf Whirlwind</font>
info:
Leap upward in a cyclone of four rapid kicks before driving a final heel drop into the ground, extending the reach of all kicking attacks with <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> force.

The full <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> combo deals 28 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, or 16 when performed without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>; triggers multi-hit effects.

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings</font>
info:
Manifest Crucible wings, take flight, and dive weapon-first into the target; twinblades replace the thrust with an eight-spin charge.

[TODO]<font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> depends on the armament: 24 for colossal swords, 22 for greatswords, light greatswords, heavy thrusting swords, great spears, and great katanas, 20 for twinblades, straight swords, katanas, spears, and halberds, 16 for thrusting swords, 12 for daggers, and 8 for throwing daggers.

name: Spinning Gravity Thrust
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust</font>
info:
Use gravity to hover in place, rotate, and drive forward with a piercing thrust, then input again to crash down in another spinning strike that knocks foes back.

Greatswords, curved greatswords, heavy thrusting swords, and great katanas deal 21 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> on the first thrust and 25 on the follow-up, while colossal swords deal 23 and 26.

Triggers multi-hit effects.

name: Palm Blast
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Palm Blast</font>
info:
Gather energy in your palm before unleashing an explosive strike that travels slightly past your reach.

Can be charged to create a wider blast that knocks enemies away, inflicts weapon status buildup across the area, and raises your <font color="#E0B985">poise</font> dramatically while charging.

Deals 20 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> uncharged and 36 when fully charged.

name: Piercing Throw
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Piercing Throw</font>
info:
Hurl the armament with a powerful spin to extend its range and let it tunnel through every foe in its path.

Each throw deals 3 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, pierces targets without losing damage, and reaches roughly double the normal range, though blocking still prevents damage even as the projectile keeps traveling.

Used without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, damage is reduced and piercing is removed.

name: Scattershot Throw
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Scattershot Throw</font>
info:
Conjure mirrored copies of the dagger in both hands and fling a cloud of 28 projectiles that can strike large foes up to four times each, then repeat with a second input.

Deals 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> per volley, counts as pierce damage for counter bonuses such as Spear Talisman, and gains about 50% more range than normal throws along with an extra close-range hitbox.

Using it without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> throws only two daggers but retains the extended range.

name: Wall of Sparks
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Wall of Sparks</font>
info:
Scatter perfumed powder around you that ignites after a short delay into a wall of intense sparks, with the element determined by the perfume bottle.

Can be charged to widen the wall and increase damage.

Each explosion inflicts 3 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

The sparks cannot be parried.

name: Rolling Sparks
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Rolling Sparks</font>
info:
Spread perfumed powder in a rolling line that erupts into successive explosions of sparks, inheriting the bottle's properties.

Each explosion deals 3 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, large targets can be struck multiple times along the trail, and the line stops releasing hits if it collides with terrain.

name: Raging Beast
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Raging Beast</font>
info:
Dash in any direction with beastlike speed, vault upward, and rake the enemy with an aerial slash before diving into a follow-up strike with a strong-attack input.

The evasive step grants 6 invulnerability frames.

The opening slash deals 6 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, and the follow-up plunge adds 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

name: Savage Claws
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Savage Claws</font>
info:
Pounce on the target and rake it with six alternating claw swipes in rapid succession.

The combo totals 22 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, and each swipe applies 60% of the weapon's status buildup.

name: Red Bear Hunt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Red Bear Hunt</font>
info:
Slaughter prey with a wide claw swipe that manifests a lingering vacuum, then chain up to two additional swipes with repeated inputs.

Each swipe inflicts continuous Standard damage in the vacuum and deals 10, 10, and 12 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> respectively for 32 total.

name: Blind Spot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Blind Spot</font>
info:
Dash to either side of a target before executing a piercing stab that slips beneath their guard, with the input determining which flank you strike from.

The dash grants 6 invulnerability frames.

The stab deals Pierce damage with 10 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> that ignores blocking.

name: Swift Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Swift Slash</font>
info:
Step forward with a razor-quick cut that slices through foes and fires a shearing vacuum, gaining power and lunge distance when charged.

Uncharged slashes deal 10 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, fully charged slashes deal 20 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, and the vacuum's repeated hits rapidly build status.

name: Overhead Stance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Overhead Stance</font>
info:
Enter a high guard, then perform a stepping downward slash with a light attack or unleash a series of plunging blows with a strong attack.

The light follow-up deals 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, the heavy series deals 22 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

Counts as a stance skill.

name: Wing Stance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Wing Stance</font>
info:
Hold a <font color="#E0B985">poise</font>d right-sided guard before releasing a rapid three-slash light combo or a leaping heavy thrust.

The light chain deals 17 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and can loop with minimal delay if the button is held, the heavy thrust deals 30 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> while hopping over low attacks without counting as a jumping attack.

Can be parried.

name: Blinkbolt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Blinkbolt</font>
info:
Transform into a bolt of lightning from a low stance and rush straight ahead even when locked onto a target.

Deals minimal <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> that inflicts just 1 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> on impact.

After 14 frames of startup, grants 16 invulnerability frames that let you ignore incoming attacks while surging forward.

name: Flame Skewer
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Flame Skewer</font>
info:
Enwreathe the armament in fire, dip into a low stance, and skewer the target in one thrust, with a strong-attack follow-up that fans flames across the front.

The initial thrust deals 24 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> with colossal swords, 22 with greatswords, greatspears, great katanas, heavy thrusting swords, and thrusting shields, 20 with straight swords, halberds, spears, twinblades, and katanas, and 16 with thrusting swords, while the follow-up flames always deal 15 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

The buff adds 95 fire attack rating for 15 seconds.

The first thrust can be parried.

name: Savage Lion's Claw
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Savage Lion's Claw</font>
info:
Somersault forward, landing a weaker Lion's Claw slash, a regular attack during the flip, and a finishing Lion's Claw slam, with an additional input enabling the final strike.

Total <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> reaches 64 with colossal weapons, 60 with great hammers, 55 with hammers, 51 with colossal swords and flails, 47 with greatswords, light greatswords, greataxes, great katanas, and curved greatswords, and 43 with straight swords, axes, twinblades, katanas, and curved swords as each hit inherits your weapon's damage type.

name: Divine Beast Frost Stomp
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Divine Beast Frost Stomp</font>
info:
Raise a leg high before stomping to send a ground-hugging wave of frost forward, creating spikes and ice explosions along its path when it detonates.

The stomp deals <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>, inflicts 70 frost buildup on both the initial spikes and each explosion, deals 5 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> uncharged or 10 when charged, and charging increases the wave's range and power.

name: Flame Spear
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Flame Spear</font>
info:
Ready a thrust imbued with flame before unleashing a fiery spear straight ahead, gaining damage and travel distance when you charge the attack.

Fully charged thrusts deal 38 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> with colossal swords, 36 with greatswords, greatspears, great katanas, heavy thrusting swords, and thrusting shields, 33 with straight swords, halberds, spears, twinblades, and katanas, 28 with thrusting swords, and 22 with daggers.

The skill adds 95 fire attack rating for 40 seconds and sends the flame projectile as soon as the thrust fires.

The weapon hit can be parried.

name: Carian Sovereignty
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Carian Sovereignty</font>
info:
Transform the blade into a massive magical greatsword and slam it down, with an additional input producing a horizontal sweep, and either attack can be charged for greater force.

A fully charged slam deals 48 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and releases a ground shockwave that fires two bursts in a line for about 40% of the initial damage each (a single foe cannot be hit by both the slam and the bursts), while the follow-up sweep deals 45 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and matches the initial cast in raw damage.

All hits deal pure <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>, weapon upgrade level, and infusion (weapon choice otherwise does not affect damage).

The skill grants significant hyper armor ranging from 118 <font color="#E0B985">poise</font> on greatswords to 22 on daggers while casting.

name: Shriek of Sorrow
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Shriek of Sorrow</font>
info:
Unleash a harrowing scream that makes nearby foes flinch before channeling resentment into your weapon for 40 seconds based on your remaining HP.

The buff increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> by 10% at 100% HP, 15% at 85% HP, 20% at 55% HP, and 25% at 30% HP or lower (reduced to 7.5%, 10%, 15%, and 20% in PvP), adds +5 <font color="#E0B985">Strength</font> scaling to the weapon, and locks in according to your HP at the moment of casting until you recast.

Cannot be parried. Counts as a weapon buff so will not stack with other buffs such as greases.

name: Shield Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Shield Strike</font>
info:
Bash forward with the equipped shield and input repeatedly to chain up to three additional shield strikes.

When assigned off-hand it gives the shield its own light attack string so you can keep the main-hand skill.

name: Igon's Drake Hunt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Igon's Drake Hunt</font>
info:
Draw the bow with a guttural bellow that prepares either a light or heavy shot, then release to fire a twisted arrow as soon as you press the corresponding attack.

Shots from this stance consume <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, deal roughly 75% more damage than normal arrows, and receive no benefit from increased roar damage.

name: Ghostflame Call
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Ghostflame Call</font>
info:
Drive the armament forward to manifest a <font color="#57DBCE">Magic Damage</font> ghostflame, applying 20 <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font>.
Following up with a light attack adds a burning trail that inflicts 20 per tick, and a strong attack increases the explosion size to 80.

Deals 4 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> for the no-input explosion, 5 for the light attack, and 11 for the heavy attack, and all apply the weapon hit <font color="#E0B985">poise damage</font> on the opening thrust.

name: Dragonwound Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Dragonwound Slash</font>
info:
Leap through the air while cloaked in jagged gravel stone, and charge the attack to fire the aura as additional damage alongside the high slash.

Inflicts 20% increased damage on Dragons and Ancient Dragons.

Deals 22 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> uncharged and 33 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> when charged.

name: Needle Piercer
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Needle Piercer</font>
info:
Generate ten gold needles that pierce at once, purging any ailments or special effects from pierced foes.

Deals 8 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> from the sword swipe plus 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> from the needles.

name: Light
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Light</font>
info:
Launch the armament upward to unleash a cone of blinding light whose rays sweep through the area.

Each ray can hit up to four times for 5 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> each and deals pure <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Faith</font>.

Grants a body buff that raises <font color="#F5EB89">Holy Damage</font> by 20% for 60 seconds, unaffected by spell duration multipliers.

name: Darkness
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Darkness</font>
info:
Raise the sword and cleave with darkness to form a veil that conceals the caster while blinding foes around them.
Enemies touched by the veil have their aggro reset, remain blinded for about 7 seconds, and suffer temporarily reduced <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font>.

name: Onze's Line of Stars
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Onze's Line of Stars</font>
info:
Imbue lined glintstones with sorcerous energy to slash once, then allow up to two follow-up attacks that swell in force with each input.

The full combo deals 30 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> total.

name: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice</font>
info:
Conjure a stinger underfoot to stab the enemy.

The stab inflicts 160 <font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot</font> and 150 Piercing Damage while creating a 70 Standard Damage shockwave on impact.

If the stung enemy is already inflicted with any poison or rot, deal an extra 5% Max HP + 250 damage to them and purge the ailment.

name: Spinning Guillotine
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Spinning Guillotine</font>
info:
Hold the putrid blade at both ends, arch backward for a powerful overhead chop, and keep inputting to spin continuously while draining <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> and 7 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> per spin.

The initial attack deals 20 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, each additional spin adds 7 and the strong attack follow-up launches into a jumping spinning slash that deals 30 damage.

name: Unending Dance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Unending Dance</font>
info: Perform a furious succession of slashes and hold the button to sustain the dance; the sequence continues as long as those <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and <font color="#E0B985">Stamina</font> allow.

name: Revenger's Blade
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Revenger's Blade</font>
info:
Dash up to an enemy with blades in each hand, extending the dash by charging. Follow with a strong attack that hacks the enemy to pieces.

Deals 5 + 24.4 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

name: Mists of Eternal Sleep
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Mists of Eternal Sleep</font>
info:
Release a velvety purple mist across a wide frontal area.

The mist deals 7 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> via the weapon hitbox and inflicts 112 <font color="#A698F4">Eternal Sleep</font> buildup on touch.

Adds 15 <font color="#A698F4">Eternal Sleep</font> buildup to the weapon for 30 seconds while the mist persists.

name: Dynastic Sickleplay
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Dynastic Sickleplay</font>
info:
Perform a finessed evasive backstep that gives directional control, then chain two additional strong attack inputs for an advancing upward slash followed by a downward bring-back strike, with the skill granting 20 i-frames.

The full sequence deals 55 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> total (33 from the first <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>-consuming follow-up and 22 from the initial follow-up that does not cost <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>).

name: Blinkbolt: Twinaxe
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Blinkbolt: Twinaxe</font>
info:
Transform into a bolt of lightning from a low stance and charge straight ahead.

Strikes for 30 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and the strong attack follow-up is a lightning-charged spinning slash.

name: Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe</font>
info:
Transform into a bolt of lightning from a low stance and charge straight ahead.

Strikes for 33 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and the strong attack follow-up is a lightning-charged leaping slash.

name: Promised Consort
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Promised Consort</font>
info:
Imbue the twin greatswords with the light of Miquella, delivering a slash accompanied by holy light columns and following with up to two additional inputs.

The full combo deals 52 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> total (15 from the opener, 15 from the second attack, and 22 from the final follow-up), while the light pillars deal <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>.

name: Shadow Sunflower Headbutt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Shadow Sunflower Headbutt</font>
info:
Slam the blossom downward to send a flattening shockwave, and chain two follow-up slams through repeated inputs for a furious combo.

The three-input sequence deals 65 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> total (20 from the opener, 15 from the second slam, and 30 from the final slam).

name: Moon-and-Fire Stance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Moon-and-Fire Stance</font>
info: Cast glintstone light waves from the ready stance with normal attacks—each light attack can be followed by up to two additional light-wave casts—and finish with a strong attack to spin into a flaming tornado that drenches the area in flame.

name: Devonia's Vortex
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Devonia's Vortex</font>
info:
Violently spin the hammer and slam the ground to unleash a shockwave.

The uncharged release deals 28 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and flattens foes, while a full charge increases it to 53.

name: Messmer's Assault
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Messmer's Assault</font>
info:
Drive a series of flame-coated spear thrusts, allowing up to two follow-up attacks before the final thrust slams into the ground and spawns countless spears around you.

The full combo deals 42 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

Counts as a Fire Knight skill.

name: Sleep Evermore
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Sleep Evermore</font>
info: Pierce with a toxin-coated needle to inflict 97 <font color="#A698F4">Eternal Sleep</font> buildup; deals significantly more damage to enemies already in slumber or eternal sleep.

name: Golden Crux
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Golden Crux</font>
info:
Leap up and skewer foes from overhead, unfolding the barbs to excruciate from within on a hit or spawning piercing barbs around you with the follow-up input, knocking enemies into the air.

It deals 17 pierce plus 16 holy <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

Consumes <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> when the hit connects; without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> the hits lose 25% damage and the beam is not fired.

name: Moore's Charge
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Moore's Charge</font>
info:
Ready the shield with both hands and charge forward while guarding, ending in a verdigris shove that knocks back and down nearby foes.

The entire charge deals 30 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> (12 from the final blast), and holding the input extends the length of the charge.

name: White Light Charge
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: White Light Charge</font>
info:
Summon white light from the meteoric ore to charge through foes.

Deals 24 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> total, and an additional input detonates an immediate white light explosion around you.

name: Rancor Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Rancor Slash</font>
info: Spin around to slash foes while summoning five vengeful spirit skulls that chase enemies and deal <font color="#57DBCE">Magic damage</font>, and use an additional input for a follow-up attack; each strike builds <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font> on contact.

name: Witching Hour Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Witching Hour Slash</font>
info:
Hold the sword level, infuse it with Night, and unleash an incorporeal series of attacks that cannot be blocked.

Deals 14 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> when uncharged and 27 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> when fully charged.

name: Euporia Vortex
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Euporia Vortex</font>
info: Twirl the armament through the vortex to execute five slashes straight ahead and fire a beam of light that consumes all of the blades' luster; without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> the weapon does not glow, each hit suffers roughly a 75% damage penalty, the beam does not fire.

name: Smithing Art Spears
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Smithing Art Spears</font>
info:
Slam the red-hot anvil into the ground and rip it free to erupt countless spears that vanish an instant later.

Deals 45 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.

name: Rancor Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Rancor Slash</font>
info:
Spin around to carve everything nearby before an optional follow-up slash, with each cut summoning five vengeful spirit skulls that pursue targets and detonate for <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font>.
Every hit and spirit explosion builds <font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite</font> buildup, so even if the weapon whiffs, the skulls continue chasing until they connect.

name: Romina's Purification
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Romina's Purification</font>
info:
<font color="#C0B194">Unique Skill</font>

Imbue the bud-blade with butterflies, then unleash two sweeping slashes for them toerupt after a short delay.

Each slash deals 8.5 + 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and the explosions add 2 apiece.
The direct hits inflict 110 <font color="#EF7676">Scarlet Rot</font> buildup with every butterfly detonation adding 22 more.

name: Poison Spear-Hand Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Poison Spear-Hand Strike</font>
info:
Shape your hand into a spear and plunge through the enemy to inject a dose of 155 <font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison</font> (415 at 60 <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font>).
The toxin deals 0.14% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 14 per second for 30 seconds, totaling 4.2% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 420 damage over the full duration.

name: Madding Spear-Hand Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Madding Spear-Hand Strike</font>
info:
Form your hand into a spear and stab through a foe to drive them mad.
A successful hit inflicts 305 <font color="#EEAA2B">Madness</font> buildup; Only threatening Tarnished <font color="#E0B985">mind</font>s.

name: Feeble Lord's Frenzied Flame
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Feeble Lord's Frenzied Flame</font>
info:
Raise the torch and exhale a stream of frenzied flame while moving, sustaining the spray for as long as the input is held until <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> is exhausted.
The cone deals <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> that scales with fire buffs and rapidly builds <font color="#EEAA2B">Madness</font> on everything caught in the blaze, including the user.

name: Repeating Fire
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Repeating Fire</font>
info:
Prime the repeating mechanism, then crank out 12 bolts: the first shot has a brief spin-up and the remaining 11 leave in a rapid stream that you can sweep manually if unlocked.
Each shot consumes 10 <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> while suffering a 67.65% damage penalty, 45% status buildup penalty, and 50% <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> penalty versus normal bolts, with the penalties worsening to roughly 90% damage loss if fired without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>.
<font color="#E0B985">Stamina</font> is spent per shot so interruptions stop further drain, but the full <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> cost is paid as soon as the first bolt launches.

name: Deadly Dance
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Deadly Dance</font>
info:
Spin forward with paired circular blades to shred foes, then add an input to unleash a sharp axe-kick finisher.

The initial dance deals 16 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> while the axe-kick adds 15 more.
The whole skill counts as a dancing attack, and the follow-up also counts as a kick.

name: Fan Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Fan Shot</font>
info:
Hold the bow horizontally to ready eight notched arrows, then fire them in a fan whenever you press light or heavy attack while the stance is active.
Each use consumes 8 of the chosen arrow type along with <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> and <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font>, so a full quiver of 99 arrows yields 12 volleys with 3 arrows remaining, and every projectile in the spread carries the properties of the ammunition you slotted.

name: Discus Hurl
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Discus Hurl</font>
info:
Hurl the roundshield like a discus infused with smithing arts, letting it hang in the air for a heartbeat before spinning vertically to chase its target and then re-materialize in your hand.
The shield keeps pursuing even as you reposition, delivering a mobile homing strike without needing to retrieve the armament manually.

name: Flower Dragonbolt
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Flower Dragonbolt</font>
info:
Call down red dragon lightning onto a target and optionally charge the thrust for greater effect.

On hit it applies a unique debuff that makes the target take 12% increased <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> (17% when fully charged) for 20 seconds, and because this debuff is unique it stacks alongside other Power Shred debuffs while the lightning blast delivers heavy damage which scales with <font color="#E0B985">Arcane</font> and benefits from the charged skill buffs.

Cannot be parried.

name: Kowtower's Resentment
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Kowtower's Resentment</font>
info:
Force the finger weapon into a resentful bow that charges while held, then slam it down to vent the pent-up anger in successive shockwaves.
The initial slam scales purely with weapon attack rating, after which the holy shockwaves scale with <font color="#E0B985">Faith</font>; does not benefit from charged attack buffs, and the weapon part hitbox counts towards skill buffs while the shockwaves do not.

name: Painful Strike
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Painful Strike</font>
info:
<font color="#C0B194">Unique Skill</font>

Unleash a chastening flurry of whip strikes that layers <font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison</font> onto the victim.

The combo deals 14 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and debuffs foes by reducing <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 8 for 30 seconds.
Cannot be parried.

name: Solitary Moon Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Solitary Moon Slash</font>
info:
Deliver a downward slash that launches a moonlit arc, the strong attack follow-up is a lunging horizontal sweep.

The opener deals 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> and the follow-up adds 28.

name: Revenge of the Night
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Revenge of the Night</font>
info:
Release a bolt of Night-infused magic that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Dexterity</font>, and if it is cast immediately after blocking it converts the absorbed blow into a much stronger retaliation.

The base shot deals 3 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> while a guard-counter version roughly triples the damage and jumps to 15 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>; unaffected by guard counter damage increase.

name: Weed Cutter
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Weed Cutter</font>
info:
Scythe through foes with broad horizontal swings, chaining the motion for as long as you can keep spending resources.

Deals 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> per hit.

name: Blindfold of Happiness
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Blindfold of Happiness</font>
info:
<font color="#C0B194">Unique Skill</font>

Swing your head while covering your eyes to unleash a lamenting wail that veils you from sight for 15 seconds, reducing enemy detection the same way as Unseen Form.
The invisibility remains active even if Crepus's Vial or Black Knife Armor hide the visual effect.

name: Jori's Inquisition
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Jori's Inquisition</font>
info:
Thrust the greatstaff overhead to launch streams of golden barbs that deal <font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage</font>.
Charging sustains the barrage briefly, letting you manually aim the rapid shots before the storm dissipates.

name: Roaring Bash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Roaring Bash</font>
info:
Roar from behind your guard to drive a shield bash that erupts in a wide shockwave, knocking back and staggering foes around you.
Freyja's Greatsword boosts this skill's damage by 10%, but roar damage buffs do not.

name: Deadly Poison Spray
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Deadly Poison Spray</font>
info:
<font color="#C0B194">Unique Skill</font>

Swing the perfume bottle overhead to release a broad, lingering cloud that inflicts continuous <font color="#40BF40">Deadly Poison</font> buildup across a wide area.
The fumes do not draw enemy attention, allowing you to melt unaware targets without breaking stealth.

name: Flare, O Serpent
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Flare, O Serpent</font>
info:
Ignite the serpents to add 90 <font color="#F48C25">Fire damage</font> to your armament for 30 seconds.

While the buff is active, heavy attacks or ground-slamming actions trigger an explosion that deals 12 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>, consumes the buff, and must be recast before another blast.
Triggering explosions with paired Serpent Flails will detonate both weapons simultaneously.
Counts as a Fire Knight skill.

name: Scattershot (Claws)
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Scattershot (Claws)</font>
info:
Conjure multiple spectral claws in each hand and hurl 28 projectiles at once, with each volley able to strike large targets up to four times.

Deals 11 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font>.
Can be repeated for a second scatter throw.
When used without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font>, only six claws are released.

name: Hone Blade
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Hone Blade</font>
info:
<font color="#C0B194">Unique Skill</font>

Stroke the blade to apply a 40-second weapon buff that increases damage by 6% (4% in PvP) and causes each hit to restore 1% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>.

Counts as a weapon buff.

name: Horn Calling
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Horn Calling</font>
info:
Shroud the weapon in tangled horns before driving it into the ground, sending pure <font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage</font> spikes upward that scale with <font color="#E0B985">Faith</font>.

The spikes deal 12 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> as they pierce targets from below.

name: Horn Calling: Storm
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Horn Calling: Storm</font>
info:
Infuse the horned blade with storm winds, then mow through enemies in a sweeping spin that strikes repeatedly with far greater range than Stormcaller.

Up to two follow-up inputs extend the combo, inflicting 24 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> on the first sweep and 17 on each subsequent spin.
Triggers multi-hit effects.

name: Tremendous Phalanx
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Tremendous Phalanx</font>
info:
Raise your weapon to summon a protective arch of homing glintblades overhead, each blade automatically firing to deal 8 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> as foes approach.

The strong attack follow-up chains into a lunging thrust for 15 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> while propelling you forward.

name: Bloodfiends' Bloodboon
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Bloodfiends' Bloodboon</font>
info:
<font color="#C0B194">Unique Skill</font>

Drive the spear through your target to detonate a ranged bloodflame eruption that deals <font color="#F48C25">Fire damage</font> and inflicts Blood Loss buildup around them rather than around yourself.
Additional inputs chain up to three thrusts, with the final stab hitting harder at the cost of a longer recovery, and the skill never coats the weapon in bloodflame.

name: Dragonform Flame
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Dragonform Flame</font>
info:
Transform your arm into a draconic maw to sweep a gout of fire in front of you, leaving burning ground that lingers briefly.

Using the skill without <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> causes a harmless sputter with no flames.

name: Lightspeed Slash
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Lightspeed Slash</font>
info:
Assume a luminous form and leap forward for a downward slash followed by radiant beams, with charging increasing the power and number of follow-up attacks while benefiting from the Godfrey Icon.

The initial slam deals 20 <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> uncharged and 32 when fully charged, and the light beams disperse <font color="#F5EB89">Holy damage</font> that scales with <font color="#E0B985">Intelligence</font>.

name: Rancor Shot
caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Rancor Shot</font>
info:
Adopt a stance to imbue your arrows with vengeful spirits, then fire rapid shots that home in on foes like Barrage while consuming <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> for each arrow.
Maintaining the stance slows movement and reduces <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 80% until you release the aim.
